name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alby - Bitcoin Wallet for Lightning & Nostr

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Bitcoin Lightning wallet and companion for accessing Bitcoin and Nostr apps, digital payments and passwordless logins.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Alby Browser Extension, sending & receiving bitcoin payments on web becomes a smooth experience for everybody.  

Our mission is to make Bitcoin, the Lightning Network and Nostr more accessible to everybody. The Alby Browser Extension is your companion to navigate these ecosystems on the web. 

The Alby Browser Extension works great together with Alby Hub, your self-custodial Lightning wallet, and Alby Go, the easiest to use mobile app for Bitcoin payments.

With the Alby Extension you can:
   •	Send & receive Bitcoin over the Bitcoin Lightning Network, onchain and over Liquid  
   •	Use Bitcoin, Lightning and Nostr apps in your browser
   •	Set custom budgets for the websites you use
   •	Manage multiple Lightning Network wallets and nodes
   •	Sign events and send messages on the Nostr network without sharing your private key  
   •	Passwordless logins with Lightning and Nostr 
   •	Tipping on Twitter, GitHub, Reddit and other websites 
   •	WebLN and NIP-07 authentication support for seamless interactions with apps

Privacy and security: With Alby you have control over your assets and data. Your private keys are encrypted and stored on your device only. No one sees your keys & actions

Open-source: Alby Browser Extension is built by the community for the community. You can always view and contribute to the source code on: https://github.com/getAlby/lightning-browser-extension

Follow us on Twitter: https://x.com/getalby

Try it out!
